downloadTitle: Microsoft Identity Manager Hybrid Reporting Agent
downloadDescription: Microsoft Identity Manager Hybrid Reporting Agent for Azure Audit Reporting
detailsSection:
Collect identity management activities across different MIM Service Systems. Hybrid audit reports show you identity management activity from Azure AD and Identity Manager.
Export reporting data. In addition to viewing your audit reports in the Azure portal, you can also export the data to generate your own custom views.
Reduce reporting audit system infrastructure cost. Hybrid reporting audit in the cloud means you could eliminate on-premises reporting data-warehouse infrastructure.
systemRequirementsSection:
Minimum Requirements
  • Microsoft Identity Manager 2016 SP1 (MIM2016SP1) Service
  • Microsoft Identity Manager 2016 (MIM2016) Service
  • Microsoft .NET 4.0 Framework
